h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Each Chapter has an optional frog boss to be defeated. These are Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, Lang-Li-Guhh Baw, Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang, Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw, Baw-Lang-Lang, and Lang-Baw-Baw.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'The Clamor of Frogs'.
The content is as follows:
**Each Chapter has an optional frog boss to be defeated. These are Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, Lang-Li-Guhh Baw, Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang, Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw, Baw-Lang-Lang, and Lang-Baw-Baw.**
